name: functions
description: Yoda Speak on Firebase using Doppler for app config and secrets management

scripts.serve: CLOUD_RUNTIME_CONFIG="$(doppler secrets download --no-file | jq '{secrets: .}')" firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.shell: CLOUD_RUNTIME_CONFIG="$(doppler secrets download --no-file | jq '{secrets: .}')" firebase functions:shell
scripts.secrets-sync: firebase functions:config:unset secrets && firebase functions:config:set secrets="$(doppler secrets download --no-file)"
